scripts.compile: deno task build && deno compile --allow-net --allow-run --allow-env --allow-read --unstable-kv --output dist/serve --no-check build/mod.ts && cp -r build/static dist/static
scripts.compile-n-run: deno task build && deno task compile && PORT=8324 ./dist/serve
scripts.compile-target: deno task build && deno compile --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --allow-read --allow-net --allow-env --unstable-kv --allow-write --output dist/serve --no-check build/mod.ts && cp -r build/static dist/static && ssh root@test.tilo.one 'rm -rf /root/app' && scp -6 -r -C ./dist 'root@test.tilo.one:/root/app'
